<p data-tinymcerootblock="">Hello <span class="data_parent_pill" style="display: inline;" contenteditable="false" data-pillvalue="{{fd_transform:724beb81-cc85-427f-acfc-3a65703bb8db}}"><span class="data_pill accepts_transform_functions" contenteditable="false" data-pillvalue="{{fd_transform:724beb81-cc85-427f-acfc-3a65703bb8db}}">2➛User Record➛Name<button id="transform_function_facade_724beb81-cc85-427f-acfc-3a65703bb8db" class="transform_function_facade no_transform_applied"><span class="inline-script-icon"><span style="display: none;">​</span></span></button></span></span>,</p> <p data-tinymcerootblock="">Your password was last changed on: <span class="data_parent_pill" style="display: inline;" contenteditable="false" data-pillvalue="{{fd_transform:34dd69f3-2197-4e19-b14f-e6c6ba159a96}}"><span class="data_pill accepts_transform_functions" contenteditable="false" data-pillvalue="{{fd_transform:34dd69f3-2197-4e19-b14f-e6c6ba159a96}}">2➛User Record➛Last Password Change<button id="transform_function_facade_34dd69f3-2197-4e19-b14f-e6c6ba159a96" class="transform_function_facade no_transform_applied"><span class="inline-script-icon"><span style="display: none;">​</span></span></button></span></span>.</p> <p data-tinymcerootblock="">Our policy is to change passwords every 60 days. Please reach out to your ServiceNow admins to have your password changed.</p> <p data-tinymcerootblock="">You will be emailed every week until your password has been changed. If your password has not been changed at the 60 day mark we will change the password and automatically email it to you. To prevent service interuptions please schedule a time with the ServiceNow admins to have the password changed before then.</p> <p data-tinymcerootblock=""> </p> <p data-tinymcerootblock="">Thanks,</p>ah_subject8c94c3b28d6424102ec8b996710c2e45geni.palla2020-11-22 03:14:14cc94c3b28d6424102ec8b996710c2e470geni.palla2020-11-22 03:14:14var__m_sys_hub_action_input_c1806bf4a70323008299b39f087901cb

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_7ec406268da4e0102ec8b996710c2e46
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.PasswordGeneratorAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>PasswordGeneratorAjax</name><script><![CDATA[var PasswordGeneratorAjax = Class.create();
PasswordGeneratorAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	generatePassword: function() {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		gr.get(this.getParameter('sysparam_sys_id'));
		var lowercase = (gr.getValue('us_sa_lower_case') == 'true');
		var uppercase = (gr.getValue('us_sa_upper_case') == 'true');
		var numbers = (gr.getValue('us_sa_number') == 'true');
		var specialCharacters = (gr.getValue('us_sa_special_character') == 'true');
		var length = parseInt(gr.getValue('us_sa_length'));
		var pass = pg.generatePassword(lowercase,uppercase,numbers,specialCharacters,length);
		
		var result = this.newItem("result");
		result.setAttribute("password", pass);
	},

	type: 'PasswordGeneratorAjax'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>geni.palla</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-21 04:02:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>7ec406268da4e0102ec8b996710c2e46</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PasswordGeneratorAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ServiceAccount" source="91a725142dac20102ec860bd53910594">91a725142dac20102ec860bd53910594</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ServiceAccount">91a725142dac20102ec860bd53910594</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7ec406268da4e0102ec8b996710c2e46</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>geni.palla</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-11-21 04:06:12</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_4f0a6d942dac20102ec860bd539105a6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.PasswordGenerator</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>PasswordGenerator</name><script><![CDATA[var PasswordGenerator = Class.create();
PasswordGenerator.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},

	generatePassword: function(lower, upper, num, sym, length){
		var passKeys = {
			lowercase: 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz',
			uppercase: 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ',
			number: '0123456789',
			symbol: '*;<>()[]{}#$?!^|'
		};
		var main = "";
		var finalPassword = "";

		var passOptions = {
			lowercase: lower,
			uppercase: upper,
			number: num,
			symbol: sym
		};

		for(i=0;i<Object.keys(passOptions).length;i++){
			var key = Object.keys(passOptions)[i];
			main += passKeys[key];
		}

		if(main != "" && length > 0){
			for(i=0;i<length;i++){
				finalPassword += main[Math.floor(Math.random() * main.length)];
			}
			return finalPassword;
		}
	},

	type: 'PasswordGenerator'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>geni.palla</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-14 02:18:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>4f0a6d942dac20102ec860bd539105a6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PasswordGenerator</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ServiceAccount" source="91a725142dac20102ec860bd53910594">91a725142dac20102ec860bd53910594</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ServiceAccount">91a725142dac20102ec860bd53910594</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4f0a6d942dac20102ec860bd539105a6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>geni.palla</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-11-14 02:39:17</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
